Notes: Library has scrapbooks filled with Apopka history, maps, newspaper clippings, photograph archive of people and buildings and micro-film reader for Apopka Chief newspapers, Highschool yearbooks & other printed materials. Exhibits have many artifacts from the 1800s to the early 1950s.Many local Indian artifacts found near Lake Apopka, artifacts from the lumber, citrus, turpentine and foliage industries.
